block_comment: The block of code signals the completion of the OCLKDELAY calibration in the PHY_INIT process. It works by continuously observing the rising edge (posedge) of the "complex_oclkdelay_calib_done" signal. When a positive edge on this signal occurs, denoting the completion of the calibration, it checks whether a reset ("rst") is not in process. If there's no reset in progress, it displays a message notifying the user of the completion of the calibration, along with the time at which this event occurred. This action provides a valuable debugging and monitoring mechanism.
